metadata.title: CVE-2018-12931 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: ntfs_attr_find in the ntfs.ko filesystem driver in the Linux kernel 4.15.0 allows attackers to trigger a stack-based out-of-bounds write and cause a denial of service (kernel oops or panic) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted ntfs filesystem.

notes.note: sbeattie> As of 2019-09-06, there is no upstream fix available

criterions.comment: linux package in hirsute is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2019-09-06').
